scripts.build-backend: grunt clean:backend && grunt tslint:backend && grunt ts:backend
scripts.build-frontend: grunt clean:frontend && grunt tslint:frontend && grunt ts:frontend
scripts.build-sass: grunt clean:sass && grunt scsslint:main && grunt sass:main
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build-backend" "npm run build-frontend" "npm run build-sass"
scripts.sequential-build: grunt clean && grunt tslint && grunt scsslint && grunt ts && grunt sass:main
scripts.start: concurrently "grunt watch:backend" "grunt watch:frontend" "grunt watch:sass" "nodemon server.js --watch app/js/"
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.prod: grunt clean && grunt ts && grunt sass:main && node server.js
